columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the specified control.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified control.

columns.name: id
columns.description: An unique identifier for the specified control.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of control, such as custom or standard.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Specifies when the control was created.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The IAM user or role that created the control.

columns.name: action_plan_title
columns.description: The title of the action plan for remediating the control.

columns.name: action_plan_instructions
columns.description: The recommended actions to carry out if the control is not fulfilled.

columns.name: control_sources
columns.description: The data source that determines from where AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the specified control.

columns.name: last_updated_at
columns.description: Specifies when the control was most recently updated.

columns.name: last_updated_by
columns.description: The IAM user or role that most recently updated the control.

columns.name: testing_information
columns.description: The steps to follow to determine if the control has been satisfied.

columns.name: control_mapping_sources
columns.description: The data mapping sources for the specified control.
